subject: Simson plus X not working on f1 2025
description_text:
Hello i bought my pedals a few months ago and now i wanted to play f1 2025
and they say they arent supported?? why cant i just play without the
support it wont reconize them and wont play why is this? can i fix this or
is it just a system error and it the games fault?

conversations.body_text: Hi Luuk4100,  Hello, here is the setup guide for using the SIMSONN Plus X pedals in F1 25: First time entering the game You may see a message: NO PRESET CONTROL SCHEME FOR DEVICE(S) SIMSONN Plus X Please customise your controls in the Settings Menu... Click Okay to continue. Bind controls and save a new scheme Go to Settings → Controls to bind pedals and buttons. When exiting, select Save as new Control Scheme, give it a name (e.g., SIMSONN), and click Save. Manage and switch control schemes Main Menu → Settings → Controls → Control Scheme List Your SIMSONN scheme will appear; you can select it directly for future use. ? Note: If you delete the scheme without backup, you will need to repeat the binding and saving process. After completing these steps, your pedals will work properly in the game, providing a realistic driving experience.
